
### Dygraphs
<http://rstudio.github.io/dygraphs>

Dygraphs provides rich facilities for charting time-series data in R and includes support for many interactive featues including series/point highlighting, zooming, and panning.

```{r}
library(dygraphs)
dygraph(nhtemp, main = "New Haven Temperatures") %>% 
  dyRangeSelector(dateWindow = c("1920-01-01", "1960-01-01"))
```
